scripts.start: npm run org:create && npm run install:package:maps && npm run source:push
scripts.install:package:maps: echo "Install Salesforce Maps" &&  sfdx force:package:install --package "Salesforce Maps" --securitytype AllUsers --noprompt --wait 10
scripts.stop: echo "Destroy Scratch Org" && sfdx force:org:delete --noprompt -u sfmaps
scripts.org:create: echo "Create Scratch Org" && sfdx force:org:create -f config/project-scratch-def.json -s -a sfmaps
